Matrix decompositions
=====================

Several matrix decompositions are supported.
They are available in `matrix.decompositions`:

LL decomposition
----------------
.. autoclass:: matrix.decompositions.LL_Decomposition
    :members:
    :inherited-members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

LDL decomposition
-----------------
.. autoclass:: matrix.decompositions.LDL_Decomposition
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :inherited-members:
    :show-inheritance:

LDL decomposition compressed
----------------------------
.. autoclass:: matrix.decompositions.LDL_DecompositionCompressed
    :members:
    :inherited-members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

Base decomposition
------------------
.. autoclass:: matrix.decompositions.DecompositionBase
    :members:
    :inherited-members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
